attributes.action: STOP IMMERGRATION, GIVE THE UK BACK TO THE BRITISH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WITH THE LACK OF HOUSING, MONEY AND ALL OTHER RESORCES FALLING IT IS THE TRUE BRITISH THAT ARE LOOSING OUT, WE HAVE TO TAKE A BACK SEAT TO ALL IMMERGRANT'S THEY CAN HAVE EVERYTHING FIRST. IT'S ABOUT TIME WE CLOSED THE DOORS TO OUR AIRPORTS AND PORTS AND LIVED FOR US. LET THE BRITISH BE SELFISH JUST LIKE THIS GOVERMENT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
